Container.Name: JunctionRelayAgent_Unraid
Container.Overview: This container collects system stats and publishes them to a remote web server which can be connected to via JunctionRelay.

Config.Name: REFRESH_RATE
Config.Description: Refresh rate for sensor data in seconds

Config.Name: ACCESS_TOKEN
Config.Description: If you want to enable authenticated access only, enter an Access Token here and in the JunctionRelay data source.
